step_feedback.feedback: Great job stretching your arm overhead! Try to keep your elbow a little straighter in future repetitions.
Good job keeping your arm overhead. Focus on straightening your elbow more as you make a fist.
You're doing well with the fist and tightening. Focus on opening your hand wider and relaxing your muscles more as you exhale.
Excellent effort on opening your hand wide and relaxing. Keep up the great work visualizing the fluid movement.

exercise_summary: You're doing a good job with the overhead pumping exercise. Focus on keeping your arm straight overhead and fully extending your fingers when you relax. This will help pump fluid effectively.
